// Author : SAGORIKA DAS
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<utility>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<list>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#define ull unsigned long long
#define ll long long
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007
#define inf 1000000006
#define pb push_back
#define MAX 100002
#define REP(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define mp make_pair
#define CLEAR(a) memset(a,0,sizeof a)
#define pii pair< int , int >
#define piii pair< int , pii >
#define piiii pair< int, piii >
using namespace std;
vector<int> q[MAX];
int c[333][333];

int main()
{
	int n,u;
	
	cin>>n>>u;
	int arr[n+1];
	CLEAR(arr);CLEAR(c);
	int len = (int)sqrt(n);
	while(u--){
    int a,b;
    cin>>a>>b;
    
    if(a > len){
    for(int i=b;i<=n;i+=a) arr[i]++;
    }
    else{
    q[b].pb(a);
    }
    }
    
    
    FOR(i,1,n+1){
                 
    REP(j,q[i].size()){
    c[q[i][j]][i%q[i][j]]++;                   
    }      
    
    FOR(j,1,len+1){
     arr[i] += c[j][i%j];               
    }
          
 }
    
    FOR(i,1,n+1) cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
   
    return 0;
}
